# Generating a Plot

We will create a simple ggplot graph using R's built-in `mtcars` dataset.

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(ggplot2)

# Create the plot
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=wt, y=mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle("Scatter Plot of MPG vs. Weight") +
  xlab("Weight (1000 lbs)") +
  ylab("Miles/(US) gallon")
```
